name: SDOH_DOM_CONFIG_INFO
description: This table stores the social determinant domain configuration display information for domains configured for use in social determinants of health workflows.

columns.name: DOM_CONFIG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the domain configuration record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the social determinant domain configuration record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the social determinant domain configuration record.
